none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 27, 2025 Description from Terminal Escape:
 North Carolina's SCARECROW are one of my favorite current US hardcore bands. When I see them live, I'm gonna lose my fukkn shit. Three searing tracks backed with three essential covers - their version of "Kill The Police" is so far beyond essential. Are there hordes of current US hardcore bands I have yet to hear? Certainly. When I listen to SCARECROW, I simply do not care about the bands I haven't heard yet. SJÄTTE MASSUTDÖENDET NÅR NORDEN!
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2020/03/scarecrow.html

seo.title: Scarecrow - Sjätte Massutdoendel Når Norden! - Terminal Escape
